description: This table contains the audit history of the Soft delete/Record status (SDFL) flag of the verification records.

columns.name: VERIFY_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the verification record

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This column holds the line number corresponding to the line of the edit. Each edit's details (instant, user id and action) associated with the verification record will be stored on a separate line.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_INSTANT
columns.description: The instant the verification record was edited.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who edited the verification record.

columns.name: SDFL_EDIT_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category value representing the action which the user performed on the verification record. This value indicated whether the user deleted or hid the record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Delete


Undo Delete


Hide


Unhide
